i've you've already done the driver install - can you verify you are using an xorg.conf file by checking if one exists in /etc/X11?  if it doesn't run "sudo nvidia-xconfig" in a terminal.
sudo mv /etc/X11/xorg.conf /etc/X11/xorg.conf.orig to make a backup then "sudo nvidia-config"
restart X with a terminal command "sudo gdm restart" - THIS WILL LOG YOU OUT!
